bacon: To cook bacon for someone, use @bacon
channels: (list) A list of channels to /JOIN on connect
enabled: (bool) True if this connection is to be started
exec: Exec executes a given python string
exec.allowed: (list) Holds a list of full IRC hostmasks (nick!ident@host) of people who are allowed to use the !exec command
help: Provides @help for all plugins and config settings
host: (str) Address of the IRC server to connect to
nickserv.password: (str/None) The password to authenticate to NickServ with
oper: (str/None) The username to send with /OPER, default: None
oper.password: (str/None) The password to use with /OPER, default: None
permissions.denied: You do not have permission to access this command
port: (int) Port of the IRC server to connect to
prettyprinter: pretty prints a formatted IRC message to the controlling terminal
reload.allowed: (list) Holds a list of full IRC hostmasks (nick!ident@host) of people who are allowed to use the @reload command
reload.wait: (int) The number of seconds to wait when being reloaded
server_password: (str/None) The password to send with /PASS, default: None
ssl: (bool) True if using SSL to connect
